key_risks: Intense competition from major players like Squarespace, Shopify, and WordPress
Pricing model concerns affecting customer retention and conversion
Customer support challenges impacting user satisfaction
Data privacy compliance risks due to evolving regulations
Dependence on freemium model limiting revenue growth
controversies: User dissatisfaction with premium plan pricing and add-ons
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and improving sustainability practices
social_issues: Customer support responsiveness and user satisfaction concerns
AI-driven engagement tools aimed at improving customer experience
governance_issues: Data privacy compliance and regulatory navigation challenges
